notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was funded by Fundação para a Ciência e Tecnologia (FCT), Fundo Europeu de Desenvolvimento Regional (FEDER) and COMPETE 2020 for financial support under the research project “The development of dermo-biotechnological applications using natural resources in the Beira and Serra da Estrela regions—DermoBio” ref. SAICT-POL/23925/2016 presented in the Notice for the Presentation of Applications No. 02/SAICT/2016—Scientific Research and Technological Development Projects (IC & DT) in Copromotion.
